string.description.discord.command.removetimeou: Removes the timeout given to a user.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.success.em: The user, **${user}**, has their timeout removed from **${guild}** for **${reason}.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.unsp: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.prob: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.rate: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.alre: That user has either already has their timeout removed, or hasn't been timed out whatsoever!
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.botm: I am missing the `TIMEOUT_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can remove the timeout from said person.
string.discord.command.removetimeout.error.user: You are missing the `TIMEOUT_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can remove the timeout from said person.
